content: I think I understand the job prospects and salary ranges better now. It's good to know that both certifications can open up more opportunities and potentially increase my salary. Since I'm looking to enhance my current role and maybe move into a more senior position, I'm leaning towards the Digital Marketing Certified Associate program from Digital Marketing Institute. However, I still need to consider my budget and time commitment. Can you help me break down the costs and time required for each program?
